contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 2009 D Ebbw Vale Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist - solo cornet Lympstone. Best Soprano - Lympstone 4 bands competed
May 17, 2009, 9:17 p.m. June 30, 2020, 1:25 p.m.
1 South West Comms Band Charles Fleming An Epic Symphony
2 Rogerstone Band Jamie Jones Five Blooms in a Welsh Garden
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
4 Blaenavon Town Band Lyndon Price
Withdrawn Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
Withdrawn Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
